metadata.name: m1ss10n #1
metadata.description:
Would you give your life for those you love?

Major Davis fully intended to return home and raise his daughter. But when the Avars rebel on the desolate, post-apocalyptic planet, he’ll have no choice but to face his own mortality—sooner than he ever expected.

m1ss10n is the stunning new audio drama created by J. Thorn—the first digital entertainment published on the blockchain, on social media, and through all traditional publishing distribution platforms, such as Amazon, Barnes & Noble, and Apple Books.

J. Thorn has licensed m1ss10n as CC0 or “No Rights Reserved,” waiving all rights to the work and placing the project as completely as possible in the public domain, so that others may freely build upon, enhance, and reuse the works for any purposes without restriction under copyright or database law.

A percentage of all proceeds goes directly to TeachRock, a non-profit that improves students’ lives by bringing the sound, stories, and science of music to all classrooms.

Your m1ss10n: Get one now before they��re gone forever.
